pullRequest.title: Added unit tests for translator part1
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: code-incubus nemanja.milutinovic@comtrade.com
Added tests for:

KapuaTranslatorApi
TranslatorDataMqttKura
TranslatorResponseMqttKura
TranslatorDataKuraMqtt

Related Issue
/
Description of the solution adopted
This is the first part of tests regarding Translators.
Screenshots
/
Any side note on the changes made
/

nodes.bodyText:
Can you please make this more specific, checking if proper payload is in the message?
I mean..it is ok to check if it's not null, but it is also vital to check if the data is as it is supposed to be.
